about.title: Hello, I'm Alex.
about.first: I was born in Germany and spent my early childhood there, but when I was young, my family moved to Spain, where I grew up and completed my degree in Web Development at IES Manacor. Being trilingual in German, Spanish and Catalan has been a valuable asset in my career, as it allowed me to work in the hotel business and tourism industry for eight years. During that time, I honed my language skills and gained valuable experience in customer service and management.
about.second: Despite my success in the hospitality industry, I always felt a strong pull toward the world of technology and web development. I decided to pursue my passion for programming and enrolled in a Web Development degree program at IES Manacor. Over the course of my studies, I gained expertise in a wide range of programming languages, frameworks, and tools, including Spring Boot, NuxtJS, Laravel, etc.
about.third:
Throughout my career, I have worked on a diverse range of projects, from e-commerce
                    websites to custom web applications. I am experienced in both front-end and back-end development using a mix of the earlier mentioned technologies.
                    In addition to my technical skills, I am also committed to delivering outstanding customer service. I pride myself on my ability to communicate
                    effectively with clients, understand their needs, and deliver solutions that exceed their expectations.
about.fourth:
When I'm not coding, you can usually find me exploring new technologies or contributing
                    to open-source projects. I am always looking for new challenges and opportunities to expand my skills.
about.fifth:
If you're looking for a dedicated web developer to help bring your ideas to
                    life, please don't hesitate to get in touch. I'd love to hear from you!

contact.title: Contact me!
contact.first: I'm currently looking for new opportunities. If you have a project or job offer you'd like to discuss, please get in touch.
contact.second: Alternatively, you can use the form below to send me a message.
contact.name: Name
